    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class application.SendRealEmail
    CLI entry point for sending a test email.
    main(String[]) - Static method in class presentation.MainApp
    Starts the application.
    MainApp - Class in presentation
    Entry point for the Library Management System CLI application.
    markOverdueNotificationSent() - Method in class domain.Loan
    Marks that an overdue notification was sent once.
    markReturned() - Method in class domain.Media
    Marks this media as returned (not borrowed) and clears the due date.
    markReturned(Loan) - Static method in class persistence.LoanRepository
    Marks the given loan as returned.
    Media - Class in domain
    Abstract base class for any borrowable media in the library (e.g., Book, CD).
    Member - Class in domain
    Represents a library member who can borrow books and manage fines.
    Member() - Constructor for class domain.Member
    Default Constructor.
    Member(String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Member
    Constructs a new Member with the specified username and password.
    Member(String, String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Member
    Constructs a new Member using an ID as the name and an email for login.
    Member(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class domain.Member
    Constructs a new Member with detailed profile information.
    MemberRepository - Class in persistence
    In-memory repository for Member entities.
    MemberRepository() - Constructor for class persistence.MemberRepository
    Creates a new MemberRepository with empty storage.
    MemberService - Class in application
    Provides services and business logic related to library members.
    MemberService() - Constructor for class application.MemberService
    Creates a MemberService with no repository configured.
    MemberService(MemberRepository) - Constructor for class application.MemberService
    Creates a MemberService with the given repository.
    MenuController - Class in presentation
    Controller orchestrating CLI interactions for admins and members.
    MenuController(MenuDisplay, InputHandler, LoginService, AdminService, MemberService, BookService, LoanService, ReminderService, AdminActions) - Constructor for class presentation.MenuController
    Constructs a new controller wiring the display, input, and service dependencies.
    MenuDisplay - Class in presentation
    Console UI helper for rendering menus and lists in the Library Management System.
    MenuDisplay() - Constructor for class presentation.MenuDisplay
    Creates a new MenuDisplay instance.
